title: Mobile Workshop on Advanced PubMed Search Strategies for Medical Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Literature Search Experience and Scholarly Database Concept Comprehension
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, group collaboration-centered, with a project-based assessment system.

learning_goals: Medical students can search for clinical research papers with 90% accuracy using MeSH terms and Boolean operators in the PubMed interface.
Learners develop literature evaluation criteria through group discussions and improve their search strategies at least twice based on peer feedback.
Participants curate and manage PubMed search results in mobile environments and cite at least five eligible papers in their final academic project report.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
